name: Overrun: Zombie Base Defense
summary: Overrun the way it was meant to be played. No in app purchases, no ads. Buy once, play forever. Overrun throws you into a post apocalyptic world to manage a group of survivors while they are bombarded by attacking zombies in waves. Build the ultimate defense to hold them back. Use grenades, first aid kits, and other useful items to help your survivors while they fight for their lives.
